channel.title: AzRoleWatcher
channel.description: Continuously monitor roles and permissions in Microsoft Entra ID and Azure.

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: bd80684d-2f5f-4130-892a-0955546282de
Display name: Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager RBAC Cluster Reader
Description: Grants read-only access to most Kubernetes cluster-scoped resources in the fleet-managed hub cluster.
Link: https://management.azure.com/bd80684d-2f5f-4130-892a-0955546282de?api-version=2022-04-01

item.title: ðŸ†• ADDED Azure role
item.description:
Id: 1dc4cd5a-de51-4ee4-bc8e-b40e9c17e320
Display name: Azure Kubernetes Fleet Manager RBAC Cluster Writer
Description: Grants read/write access to most Kubernetes cluster-scoped resources in the fleet-managed hub cluster.
Link: https://management.azure.com/1dc4cd5a-de51-4ee4-bc8e-b40e9c17e320?api-version=2022-04-01
